alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern West Baton Rouge, northwestern Livingston, Iberville and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 451 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from White Castle to 6 miles northwest of Livingston. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Denham Springs, Plaquemine, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Walker, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Westminster, Watson, Bayou Sorrel, Shenandoah, Greenwell Spring, Old Jefferson, Merrydale and Inniswold. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 145 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge
